name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DriveSlides by Matt Miller and Alice Keeler

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a Google Slides presentation out of a Drive folder of images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unfortunately DriveSlides is no longer available. Please use Photo to Slides Add-on from the G Suite Marketplace https://gsuite.google.com/marketplace/app/photos_to_slides/647697115592
